text: Þis syndon þa landgemæru to cuþenes dune XX hida.
Of hryþera forda on holan ford.
Of holan forde on lahhan mere andlang riþiges on bradan mædwa.
Þæt swa norð andlang fura on set þorn.
Of set þorne on fulan riþig on anne pyt.
Of þam pytte andlang riþiges on þæt heafod lond.
Of þam heafodon andlang fura.
On pric þorn on foreweardne eanferþes hlau.
Of eanferþes hlawe andlang fure.
Þæt on an riþig.
Andlang riþiges<../images/tbar.gif>on ane dic.
Andlang dices on drygean broc.
Þæt swa andlang dices on mærwelle broc.
Andlang broces on mærwelle.
Of mærwelle on þæt heafod long on gerihte to stræt.
Þonne east andlang stræte.
Oþ þæra stræta gelæto.
Þonan rihte norþ ondlong weges oþ þa heafdo<../images/tbar.gif>on mær weg.
Andlong mær weges<../images/tbar.gif>onbutan ceorla graf.
On fost broc.
Of fost broce on þone hlið weg.
Andlong weges on hina gemæro.
Andlong hina gemæres on þa hlydan.
<../images/tbar.gif>of þær hlydan on þa stan bricge.
Andlong healhtunes gemæres on risc dene.
Þæt of risc dene on gerihte on þæt þri ex.
Of þan þri exe on þa stræt.
Andlong stræte on holan broc.
Andlong broces on herpaþ ford on tame andlong tame<../images/tbar.gif>eft on hryþera ford.
Þis is seo lanboc to Cuþenes dune to þan twentigan hidan þe Eadwig cync gebocede Ælfhere his ealdormen on yrfe.
